Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 4.68 Å to 5.12 Å (sieving pores), <4.68 Å (invalid pores), >5.12 Å (nonsieving pores)
Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: Amorphous porous carbon with locally ordered graphitic microdomains

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: C3H6/C3H8 selectivity: 106.75, C3H6 uptake: 1.88 mmol/g at 298 K and 1 bar

Other Information.Additional Info: Proposed three-region model for pore size distribution in amorphous porous carbons; prepared from coffee bean biomass via pyrolysis and activation with FeCl3
